EmailTemplate.name: NA_Enterprise_Manufacturing_Cold_Nurture.Manufacturing_Cold_Nurture_Enterprise_E
EmailTemplate.subject: The 5 Stages of Cloud Adoption
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-secrets-webinar-series-5-stages-of-cloud-adoption/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Enterprises adopt the public cloud in five discrete stages, each marked by tell-tale practices, challenges, and cost structures.
Where is your organization in your cloud journey and what should you be doing today to get set for cloud success?
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-secrets-webinar-series-5-stages-of-cloud-adoption/]]>
Watch this webcast <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-secrets-webinar-series-5-stages-of-cloud-adoption/]]> to help your organization benchmark where it is and where it’s going.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
PS. Turbonomic can help your organization accelerate and de-risk your cloud migration. Learn more. <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects]]>
